summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Appendix 3G (Employee incentive scheme issuance)  
- **Security Issued**: 2,110 unquoted share rights (SGHAB) under an employee incentive scheme  
- **Issue Date**: 29 April 2025  
- **Vesting Conditions**:  
  - 40% (Grant 1) vest on ~1 October 2025 (performance period: 1 July 2024 – 30 June 2025)  
  - 60% (Grant 2) vest on ~1 October 2026 (performance period: 1 July 2025 – 30 June 2026)  
- **Total Unquoted Share Rights Outstanding**: 1,914,163 (SGHAB)  
- **No material dilution or capital impact**: Issued under 15% placement capacity (no shareholder approval required).  

**No further material information identified**.
